thread.title: 'No ring, no bring!': Pippa Middleton 'cunning plan' to block Meghan Markle from her wedding
thread.title_full: 'No ring, no bring!': Pippa Middleton 'cunning plan' to block Meghan Markle from her wedding

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: 'No ring, no bring!': Pippa Middleton 'cunning plan' to block Meghan Markle from her wedding
text:
Pippa is rumoured to be insisting on married or engaged plus ones only for wedding guests (Photo: MEGA/Getty) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Pippa Middleton plans to avoid being overshadowed on her wedding day by trying to stop Prince Harry’s glamorous girlfriend Meghan Markle from attending. 
Pippa , who is due to marry boyfriend James Matthews in May, is rumoured to have told friends she’ll be enforcing a policy of only allowing guests a plus one if they are married or engaged to their partner, the infamous 'no ring, no bring' rule, - and of course, Meghan and Harry are neither. 
Last week, when Meghan and Harry attended a friend’s wedding in Jamaica , the couple attracted a lot of attention. Pippa wants to avoid being upstaged, according to friends (Photo: Getty) Pippa and her fiance James Matthews (Photo: PA) Meghan and Harry at last week's wedding in Jamaica (Photo: MEGA) 
They were pictured holding hands and looking affectionate at the wedding of pals Tom ‘Skippy’ Inskip and Lara Hughes-Young. 
“She saw how all eyes were on Meghan rather than Lara,” a friend tells The Mail On Sunday . “The situation was also stressful for Harry. Pippa and her mother Carole wonder whether Meghan’s presence could cause a great deal of unnecessary chaos.” 
Pippa and James’ wedding is due to take place in a private church in Berkshire, followed by a reception at the Middleton’s home nearby. 
Following Harry and Meghan's outing to their friends' wedding in Jamaica, a source said: "This the first time that she and Harry have socialised so openly as a couple and is a significant step up in their relationship." Pippa and Harry at Kate and William's wedding in 2011 (Photo: Getty) Harry and Meghan, loved up (Photo: MEGA) Read More
